content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.5, 2.0)
- Steam engine at position (-0.5, 5.5)
- Connected with pipes
- Small electric pole at position (1.5, 5.5) and (2.5, 5.5)
- Fueled by coal

### Iron Ore Mining at position (18.5, 73.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (18.5, 73.5)
- Wooden chest for iron ore at position (18.5, 75.5)
- Inserter at position (20.5, 75.5) and (21.5, 75.5)
- Connected to power network

### Copper Ore Mining at position (-48.5, 78.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (-48.5, 78.5)
- Wooden chest for copper ore at position (-48.5, 80.5)
- Inserter at position (-45.5, 80.5)
- Connected to power network

### Iron Smelting at position (22.5, 78.5)
Consists of:
- Electric furnace at position (22.5, 78.5)
- Inserter to move iron plates from furnace to chest at position (22.5, 80.5)
- Wooden chest for iron plates at position (22.5, 81.5)
- Inserter to move iron plates to circuit assembler at position (22.5, 83.5)
- Inserter to input iron ore into furnace at position (20.5, 78.5) (not connected to power)
- Connected to power network

### Copper Smelting at position (-44.5, 83.5)
Consists of:
- Electric furnace at position (-44.5, 83.5)
- Inserter to move copper plates from furnace to chest at position (-44.5, 85.5)
- Wooden chest for copper plates at position (-44.5, 86.5)
- Inserter to move copper plates to cable assembler at position (-41.5, 86.5)
- Inserter to move copper plates from chest at position (-44.5, 88.5)
- Connected to power network

### Copper Cable Production at position (-39.5, 90.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (-39.5, 90.5) with copper cable recipe
- Inserter to move copper cables from assembler to chest at position (-39.5, 92.5)
- Wooden chest for copper cables at position (-39.5, 93.5)
- Inserter to move copper cables at position (-39.5, 95.5)
- Connected to power network

### Electronic Circuit Production at position (27.5, 85.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (27.5, 85.5) with electronic circuit recipe
- Inserter to move electronic circuits from assembler to chest at position (27.5, 87.5) (not connected to power)
- Wooden chest for electronic circuits at position (27.5, 88.5)
- Connected to power network

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities with transport belts
- Transport belts cannot be connected directly from a wooden chest as a source - add an inserter that takes items from the chest and use the inserter as a source entity
- Transport belts cannot be connected directly to an assembling machine as a target - add an inserter that inputs items into the assembling machine and use the inserter as the target entity

### Errors when placing entities in occupied positions
- When placing inserters or connecting entities, check if the target position is already occupied by another entity
- When using `connect_entities`, ensure the source inserter's drop position is not already occupied by other entities

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities
- When using `place_entity_next_to`, check if the target position already has an entity
- Consider increasing spacing, changing direction, or changing the reference position if placement fails due to existing entities

### Power connection issues
- Ensure all inserters and machines are connected to the power
